rules_text:
When Peter Parker enters, create a 1/1 green and blue Spider creature token with “{T}, Sacrifice this creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.”
At the beginning of your end step, if Peter Parker has a +1/+1 counter on him, exile him and return him to the battlefield transformed.
rules_text2:
Reach, vigilance, ward {2} [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)[/i]
{2}{W}: Put a web counter on target creature. It gains “Spiders have protection from this creature.” [i](It can't block, target, or deal damage to Spiders.)[/i]
flavor_text2: [i]. . . there must also come great responsibility.”[/i]
